org.overture.interpreter.messages.rtlog

Class RTLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.overture.interpreter.messages.rtlog.RTLogger

  • public class RTLogger
extends Object
    Real-time logger. This logger delegates the actual logging to its internal loggers that each must have an output location specified through setLogfile(Class, File)
    Author:
    kel
